title: Russia is now in control of much of Severodonetsk, the epicenter of the battle for Ukraine's eastern Donbas region
content:
1. Russia is now in control of much of Severodonetsk, the epicenter of the battle for Ukraine's eastern Donbas region  CNN
  2. Thousands Of Ukrainian Civilians Trapped In Sievierodonetsk As Russian Bombardment Continues  NBC News
  3. Putin appears to hint at further invasions; Zelenskyy says Ukrainian forces holding on in the Donbas  CNBC
  4. June 10, 2022 Russia-Ukraine news  CNN
  5. Russia-Ukraine war: List of key events, day 108  Al Jazeera English
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News

localize.title: ロシアは現在、ウクライナ東部ドンバス地域の戦いの震源地であるセベロドネツクの大部分を支配下に置いている
俄罗斯现在控制了乌克兰东部顿巴斯地区战斗的中心--塞维罗涅茨克的大部分地区
俄羅斯現在控制了烏克蘭東部頓巴斯地區戰鬥的中心--塞維羅涅茨克的大部分地區
